name: Heart Strings (MoonlightDaemon)
description:
At Amoncre High School For Single Young Adults there's only one requirement to graduate: Get Married to a fellow student! Take classes and go on dates with your classmates and find true love.

A crafting feature! Collect resources and create items to use throughout the game!

Four Unique Dates! Find true love between four characters with their own personalities!

Take Classes! Increase your stats and earn money by taking classes at the school!
